Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Listenin' to this music makes me wanna
get to dancin'.<sp:0:4:0>What a great show!
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Ah, there's the rain. Better go somewhere
I can stay out of it.
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>It's great to get to kick back and listen
to music like this.
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>I wanna get a little closer to the band.
Can this wait till I get there?
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting_01>Oh! I was wonderin' who that might be...<sp:5:0:0>
and it's you! The fella who rescued me at
Gerudo Canyon!
Now that me and my buddies finished our
travels safe and sound, I'm takin' a nice,
pleasant journey all on my own.
But I wouldn't be here listenin' to this
music if ya didn't come save me when
ya did. <sp:5:0:0>Thanks again!
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Y'know, I used to hate the rain.<sp:0:4:0>But that all changed after the whole
Gerudo Canyon incident.<sp:0:4:0>Now I love the rain! Water is life, after all!
